data.description: Tie a facade around a scalar, array, or hash
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This started as a quick wrapper around hashes to perform
    essentially the same functionality as DBM filters. However, after
    some discussion with the folks on module-authors@perl.org, I've
    written a suite to wrap a facade around scalars, arrays, or hashes
    with a simple interface.

    I don't know of anything besides the filter methods of the various
    DBM packages that is very similar.
